name: Apocaries
text:
When this card is activated: Place Caries Counters on this card equal to the number of cards your opponent controls. You can target 1 face-up monster your opponent controls and remove up to 4 Caries Counters from your field; apply this effect to that monster based on the number removed.
● 1: It loses 500 ATK.
● 2: Change its ATK to 0.
● 3: Negate its effects.
● 4: Destroy it.
You can only activate 1 "Apocaries" per turn.
